titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament concerning a late difference betweene some officers of the English and some of the Scottish nation, for the preservation of the peace and mutuall amity betweene both Kingdomes against the seditious speeches of some ill affected persons who seeke to raise it to a nationall quarrell : also an ordinance of both Houses, nominating and authorizing diverse persons in severall counties to bee added to the committees for the weekely assessment.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
